    Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request.

    Authentication.support contains the specific implementations of the AuthenticationHandler interface.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileAuthenticationHandler
      Class designed to read data from a file in the format of USERNAME SEPARATOR PASSWORD that will go line by line and look for the username.
      class  RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler
      AuthenticationHandler which fails to authenticate a user purporting to be one of the blocked usernames, and blindly authenticates all other users.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic.remote

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.generic.remote 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RemoteAddressAuthenticationHandler
      Checks if the remote address is in the range of allowed addresses.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.jdbc

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.jdbc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractJdbcUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler
      Abstract class for database authentication handlers.
      class  BindModeSearchDatabaseAuthenticationHandler
      This class attempts to authenticate the user by opening a connection to the database with the provided username and password.
      class  QueryAndEncodeDatabaseAuthenticationHandler
      A JDBC querying handler that will pull back the password and the private salt value for a user and validate the encoded password using the public salt value.
      class  QueryDatabaseAuthenticationHandler
      Class that if provided a query that returns a password (parameter of query must be username) will compare that password to a translated version of the password provided by the user.
      class  SearchModeSearchDatabaseAuthenticationHandler
      Class that given a table, username field and password field will query a database table with the provided encryption technique to see if the user exists.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.radius.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.radius.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RadiusAuthenticationHandler
      Authentication Handler to authenticate a user against a RADIUS server.

      AuthenticationHandler which authenticates Principal-bearing credentials.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.x509.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.x509.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  X509CredentialsAuthenticationHandler
      Authentication Handler that accepts X509 Certificates, determines their validity and ensures that they were issued by a trusted issuer.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcceptUsersAuthenticationHandler
      Handler that contains a list of valid users and passwords.
      class  LdapAuthenticationHandler
      LDAP authentication handler that uses the ldaptive Authenticator component underneath.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler
      Abstract authentication handler that allows deployers to utilize the bundled AuthenticationHandlers while providing a mechanism to perform tasks before and after authentication.
      class  AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler
      Abstract class to override supports so that we don't need to duplicate the check for UsernamePasswordCredential.
      class  HttpBasedServiceCredentialsAuthenticationHandler
      Class to validate the credential presented by communicating with the web server and checking the certificate that is returned against the hostname, etc.
      class  JaasAuthenticationHandler
      JAAS Authentication Handler for CAAS.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.openid.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.openid.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OpenIdCredentialsAuthenticationHandler
      Ensures that the OpenId provided matches with the existing TicketGrantingTicket.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.pac4j.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.pac4j.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractClientAuthenticationHandler
      Generic handler for delegated authentication: it uses the client credentials to get the user profile returned by the provider for an authenticated user.
      class  ClientAuthenticationHandler
      Specialized handler which builds the authenticated user directly from the retrieved user profile.

    • Uses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.authentication.handler.support

      Subclasses of AbstractAuthenticationHandler in org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.authentication.handler.support 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JCIFSSpnegoAuthenticationHandler
      Deprecated. 
      As of 4.1, the class name is abbreviated in a way that is not per camel-casing standards and will be renamed in the future.
      class  NtlmAuthenticationHandler
      Implementation of an AuthenticationHandler for NTLM supports.
